p: The other element I would add is that at the moment we must play on two courts. On one hand, we have spaces conquered by the movements of small-scale food producers, which are the CFS and the CSM. From there, we can take advantage of the conditions that allow us to be part of the multilateral system of the United Nations through the CFS and follow up and monitor the decisions that will be promoted based on the conclusions and results of the UN Food Systems Summit.
